info: Wife of the companion Abu ad-Dardāʾ. She was a scholar, jurist, and teacher based in Damascus and Jerusalem.
8th century jurist, author, ascetic, and hafiẓ

info: Son of ʿAbdullah ibn ʿUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb
